Class OpNtcip

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.OpController

Direct Known Subclasses:
OpDMS, OpEss, OpLCS, OpQueryGpsLocation, OpQueryModules, OpQuerySystem, OpSyncTime

Operation for NTCIP device.
